title: Navigating the Quarterback Crop of the 2018 NFL Draft and More Draft Crushes | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 255)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark discuss the possibility of the Cleveland Browns drafting two quarterbacks (01:30) before debating whether they'd rather draft Josh Allen (19:30), Sam Darnold (25:30), Josh Rosen (28:45), or Baker Mayfield (33:00). Then Danny Kelly joins the show to share some more prospects to keep an eye on (37:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
